column1: '''Nils Eng''' is a Swedish designer and author of games. He made the video game [[Bilbo (video game)|Bilbo]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/bilbo.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=6 Meristation
